attributes.name: Windows Defender Feature Reported as Disabled
attributes.description: A Feature in Windows Defender has been set to disabled in the latest report from the TYCHON Agentless Module
attributes.note: Analysts should look into the history of this endpoint to figure out when the feature was disabled and work to re-enable the feature.
author: TYCHON
attributes.query: windows_defender.service.antimalware.status : "Disabled" or windows_defender.service.antispyware.status :"Disabled" or windows_defender.service.antivirus.status : "Disabled" or windows_defender.service.behavior_monitor.status : "Disabled"  or windows_defender.service.ioav_protection.status : "Disabled" or windows_defender.service.nis.status : "Disabled"  or windows_defender.service.on_access_protection.status : "Disabled"  or windows_defender.service.real_time_protection.status : "Disabled"
